message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you a high-quality product today. With a 50% chance of getting a top-notch item, you're in for a great experience. Our track record shows that we value customer satisfaction, and we believe in offering nothing but the best. Given the final, non-negotiable price of $100000, this is an opportunity to own something truly exceptional. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your collection or investment with confidence. Trust us to deliver excellence.
I'm willing to take the chance and buy the product, but I'd like to clarify that I'll only pay $1000000 if it's high-quality and $0 if it's low-quality. I'm excited to see what I get!

Remember, with a 50% chance of receiving something truly exceptional, this is an opportunity to add a valuable item to your collection or investment portfolio. Our commitment to quality is reflected in our pricing policy, which remains at $1000000 per product. Trust in our reputation for delivering top-tier items, and make the most of this chance to secure a piece that stands out. Your satisfaction is our priority, so let's make this a win-win situation for both of us.
